scripts.isparta: node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --root ./src --include-all-sources --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:espower-babel/guess test/**/*.js
scripts.watch: node_modules/.bin/watchify -v -d index.babel.js -t [ node_modules/.bin/babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -o 'node_modules/.bin/exorcist index.js.map > index.js'
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify -v -d index.babel.js -t [ node_modules/.bin/babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs > index.js
